channel.title: All these servers are screwed..they always flipping say there down
channel.description:
everysingle server i go to it says "error connecting to server. must be down. Click "cancel" then "start server" to make your own...
ppl told me its just down and the owner has to restart agian...but on every flipping server it says this...wtf is up with...make a decent server that works. :mad:

lol i did read the guides dumbass. You guys are a bunch of fucking stupid idiots that dropped out of school and dont know how to fucking write down the correct information.

cya later. your servers are a peice of trash.
